name: Aashirvaad Select
description: Aashirvaad Select atta is made from 100% MP Sharbati wheat that is harvested exclusively in 7 districts of Madhya Pradesh. Here, the golden fields are sun-kissed to perfection and showered by the right amount of rain. This is why each grain has a golden sheen and is heavier in feel. Aashirvaad Select is prepared to give you the finest, softest and fluffiest rotis you have ever tasted. The best of nature, with every bite!
